SinglePlayerBoard() - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.view.gui.SinglePlayerBoard
 
SinglePlayerController - Class in it.polimi.se2018.controller
This class extends the abstract Controller class and implements those behaviors that are different in Single Player from MultiPlayer mode: the main differences are in the management of the connection/reconnection of the Player, in the game's setting up, in the ToolCard's usage and in the end game scoring.
SinglePlayerController(Game, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.controller.SinglePlayerController
Creates a new controller for the Single Player mode associated to the specified game instance.

stop() - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.TcpServer
Stops the server imposing the TcpGatherer to close the ServerSocket on which it is waiting for client connections, to shutdown the threadPool and setting isRunning to false: the server is not active anymore and it is not ready to receive client connections.
